extension.name: Latest/Most CompojoomComment
extension.author: Daniel Dimimtrov
extension.description:
Display the
  • Latest comments
  • Most voting yes comments
  • Most voting no comments
  • Most rated comments
  • Most commented content item
of the compojoomComment component.

!CompojoomComment must be installed.

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

field.name: template
field.label: Choose template
field.description: Choose the template file to display the latest comments

field.name: component
field.label: Component
field.query: SELECT component AS value, component AS component FROM #__comment_setting
field.description: Will display comments of the specified component.

field.name: time_frame
field.label: Time frame
field.description: Set the time frame in days. -1 no limit (all time)

field.name: maxlines
field.label: Number of rows
field.description: The number of comments OR content items you want to display.

field.name: @spacer
field.label: MOST COMMENTED PARAMETERS
field.description: Only used for Most commented content items

field.name: linesize
field.label: Line size
field.description: Number of characters of the content item title line. empty means no limit.

field.name: @spacer
field.label: COMMENTS PARAMETERS
field.description: Not used for Most commented content items

field.name: showname
field.label: Show author name
field.description: Select to hide or show the author name

field.name: showtime
field.label: Show comment date
field.description: Select to hide or show the coment date

field.name: userSize
field.label: User line size
field.description: Number of characters of the Date and Username line, to display. 0 means no limit (not recommended).

field.name: conttitlesize
field.label: Content title size
field.description: Number of characters of the content title, to display. 0 means no limit (not recommended).

field.name: commentsize
field.label: Comment size
field.description: Number of characters of the comment, to display. 0 means no limit (not recommended).

field.name: date_format
field.label: Date format
field.description: As for the PHP strftime() function

field.name: tooltip
field.label: Tooltip display
field.description: Display more comment information when mouse cursor over

field.name: showconttitle
field.label: Tooltip content item title
field.description: Show the title of the content item

field.name: overtitlesize
field.label: Tooltip title size
field.description: Number of characters of overlay title

field.name: overcontentsize
field.label: Tooltips content size
field.description: Number of characters of overlay content
